Import Proc
Here I import data

```{r}
library(haven)
airline <- read_sas("http://www.principlesofeconometrics.com/sas/airline.sas7bdat", 
    NULL)
airline
```

Data Wrangle
Cleaning my data here

Data Viz

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

airline %>%
 filter(Y >= 7.6 & Y <= 18.2) %>%
 filter(W >= 0.42 & W <= 1.42) %>%
 ggplot() +
 aes(x = W, y = Y, fill = L, colour = YEAR, size = K) +
 geom_point() +
 theme_minimal()
```
